/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars can be seen in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
